trans-unit.source: Serves as the base class for all ASP.NET version 2.0 data-bound controls that display their data in list or tabular form.
trans-unit.target: 用作所有以列表或表格形式显示数据的 ASP.NET 2.0 版数据绑定控件的基类。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataBoundControl> class is the base class used for ASP.NET controls that retrieve tabular or list-style data from an ASP.NET data source control and bind user-interface (UI) elements of the control to that data for display.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataBoundControl>类是用于检索表格的 ASP.NET 控件的基类或从 ASP.NET 数据的列表样式数据源控件，并将控件的用户界面 (UI) 元素绑定到该数据以供显示。

trans-unit.source: Composite data-bound controls such as <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>, <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView>, and <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView>; list-style data-bound controls such as <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BulletedList> and <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CheckBoxList>; and other controls such as <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.AdRotator> derive from <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataBoundControl>.
trans-unit.target: 复合数据绑定控件，如<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>， <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView>，和<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView>; 列表样式数据绑定控件，如<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BulletedList>和<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CheckBoxList>; 和类似于其他控件<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.AdRotator>派生自<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataBoundControl>。

trans-unit.source: Page developers do not use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataBoundControl> class directly; instead, they use controls that derive from this class.
trans-unit.target: 不使用网页开发人员<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataBoundControl>类直接; 相反，它们使用从此类派生的控件。

trans-unit.source: Control developers extend this class to create data-bound controls that work with classes that implement the <xref:System.Web.UI.IDataSource> interface and classes that derive from the <xref:System.Web.UI.DataSourceControl> and <xref:System.Web.UI.DataSourceView> classes.
trans-unit.target: 控件开发人员扩展此类，以创建可与实现的类的数据绑定控件<xref:System.Web.UI.IDataSource>接口和类派生自<xref:System.Web.UI.DataSourceControl>和<xref:System.Web.UI.DataSourceView>类。

trans-unit.source: When deriving a class from the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataBoundControl> class, override the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataBoundControl.PerformDataBinding%2A> method to bind the UI elements of your control to data retrieved by the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataBoundControl.GetData%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 派生类时<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataBoundControl>类，请替代<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataBoundControl.PerformDataBinding%2A>方法来检索到的数据绑定控件的 UI 元素<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataBoundControl.GetData%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: In most cases, the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataBoundControl.PerformDataBinding%2A> method is the only method you will override in your derived class.
trans-unit.target: 在大多数情况下，<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataBoundControl.PerformDataBinding%2A>方法是在派生类中的设置将替代的唯一方法。

trans-unit.source: For ASP.NET 2.0 data-bound controls, the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataBoundControl.PerformSelect%2A> method is the equivalent of the `DataBind` method, and is called to bind data at run time.
trans-unit.target: 对于 ASP.NET 2.0 数据绑定控件，<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataBoundControl.PerformSelect%2A>方法相当于`DataBind`方法，并被调用来将数据绑定在运行时。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataBoundControl.PerformSelect%2A> method calls the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataBoundControl.GetData%2A> and <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataBoundControl.PerformDataBinding%2A> methods.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataBoundControl.PerformSelect%2A>方法调用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataBoundControl.GetData%2A>和<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataBoundControl.PerformDataBinding%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates how to derive a class from the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataBoundControl> class to create a custom data-bound control.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例演示如何从派生类<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataBoundControl>类创建自定义的数据绑定控件。

trans-unit.source: The `TextBoxSet` control creates a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TextBox> control for each data item retrieved from its associated data source control, and binds to the value of the data item at run time.
trans-unit.target: `TextBoxSet`控件创建<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TextBox>控制每个数据项检索通过其关联的数据源控件，并在运行时将绑定到数据项的值。

trans-unit.source: The current implementation of the `Render` method renders the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TextBox> controls as an unordered list.
trans-unit.target: 当前实现`Render`方法呈现<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TextBox>控件作为未经排序的列表。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates how to use the `TextBoxSet` control, defined in the previous example, and bind it to an <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.AccessDataSource> control.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例演示如何使用`TextBoxSet`控件，在前面的示例中定义并将其绑定到<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.AccessDataSource>控件。

trans-unit.source: Initializes the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataBoundControl" /> class for use by an inherited class instance.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataBoundControl" /> 类以供继承的类实例使用。

trans-unit.source: This constructor can only be called by an inherited class.
trans-unit.target: 此构造函数只能由继承的类调用。

trans-unit.source: Occurs when data methods are being called.
trans-unit.target: 在数据方法正被调用时发生。

trans-unit.source: The purpose of this event is to give you an opportunity to specify that the data methods to be called are on a different object than the <xref:System.Web.UI.Page> object.
trans-unit.target: 此事件的用途是为你提供机会指定数据方法要被调用位于不同的对象比<xref:System.Web.UI.Page>对象。

trans-unit.source: For a tutorial series on using model binding with Web Forms, see [Model Binding and Web Forms](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=286117).
trans-unit.target: 在 Web 窗体中使用模型绑定教程系列，请参阅[模型绑定和 Web 窗体](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=286117)。

trans-unit.source: Creates a default <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.DataSourceSelectArguments" /> object used by the data-bound control if no arguments are specified.
trans-unit.target: 如果未指定参数，则创建由数据绑定控件使用的默认 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.DataSourceSelectArguments" /> 对象。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.DataSourceSelectArguments" /> initialized to <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.DataSourceSelectArguments.Empty" />.
trans-unit.target: 初始化为 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.DataSourceSelectArguments" /> 的 <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.DataSourceSelectArguments.Empty" />。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataBoundControl.CreateDataSourceSelectArguments%2A> method is used by the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataBoundControl.SelectArguments%2A> property to initialize a default arguments object, and by the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataBoundControl> class's implementation of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataBoundControl.PerformSelect%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataBoundControl.CreateDataSourceSelectArguments%2A>方法由<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataBoundControl.SelectArguments%2A>属性来初始化默认自变量对象，并通过<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataBoundControl>类的实现<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataBoundControl.PerformSelect%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates how the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataBoundControl.CreateDataSourceSelectArguments%2A> method can be used in a derived class to retrieve a default <xref:System.Web.UI.DataSourceSelectArguments> object.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例演示如何<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataBoundControl.CreateDataSourceSelectArguments%2A>方法可以使用派生类中，来检索默认<xref:System.Web.UI.DataSourceSelectArguments>对象。

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ModelDataSource" /> object is being created.
trans-unit.target: 当 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ModelDataSource" /> 对象正被创建时发生。

trans-unit.source: The purpose of this event is to give you an opportunity to change the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ModelDataSourceView> instance in scenarios where you want to use a custom class that derives from the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ModelDataSourceView> class.
trans-unit.target: 此事件的目的是让你更改的机会<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ModelDataSourceView>在方案中你想要使用派生自的自定义类的实例<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ModelDataSourceView>类。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the name of the list of data that the data-bound control binds to, in cases where the data source contains more than one distinct list of data items.
trans-unit.target: 当数据源包含多个不同的数据项列表时，获取或设置数据绑定控件绑定到的数据列表的名称。

trans-unit.source: The name of the specific list of data that the data-bound control binds to, if more than one list is supplied by a data source control.
trans-unit.target: 数据绑定控件绑定到的特定数据列表的名称（如果数据源控件提供了多个列表）。

trans-unit.source: The default value is <see cref="F:System.String.Empty" />.
trans-unit.target: 默认值为 <see cref="F:System.String.Empty" />。

trans-unit.source: The value of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataBoundControl.DataMember%2A> property is stored in view state.
trans-unit.target: 值<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataBoundControl.DataMember%2A>属性存储视图状态中。

trans-unit.source: This property cannot be set by themes or style sheet themes.
trans-unit.target: 无法通过主题或样式表主题设置此属性。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see <xref:System.Web.UI.ThemeableAttribute> and [ASP.NET Themes and Skins](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/5df3ebbd-d46c-4502-9406-02f9df4ef2c3).
trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息，请参阅<xref:System.Web.UI.ThemeableAttribute>和[ASP.NET 主题和皮肤](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/5df3ebbd-d46c-4502-9406-02f9df4ef2c3)。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the ID of the control from which the data-bound control retrieves its list of data items.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置控件的 ID，数据绑定控件从该控件中检索其数据项列表。

trans-unit.source: The ID of a control that represents the data source from which the data-bound control retrieves its data.
trans-unit.target: 表示数据源的控件的 ID，数据绑定控件从该控件中检索其数据。

trans-unit.source: Gets an object that implements the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.IDataSource" /> interface, which provides access to the object's data content.
trans-unit.target: 获取一个对象，该对象实现 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.IDataSource" /> 接口，以便提供对该对象的数据内容的访问。

trans-unit.source: An object with access to its data content.
trans-unit.target: 具有对其数据内容的访问权限的对象。

trans-unit.source: Retrieves a <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.DataSourceView" /> object that the data-bound control uses to perform data operations.
trans-unit.target: 检索数据绑定控件用于执行数据操作的 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.DataSourceView" /> 对象。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.DataSourceView" /> that the data-bound control uses to perform data operations.
trans-unit.target: 数据绑定控件用于执行数据操作的 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.DataSourceView" />。

trans-unit.source: If the <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataBoundControl.DataMember" /> property is set, a specific, named <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.DataSourceView" /> is returned; otherwise, the default <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.DataSourceView" /> is returned.
trans-unit.target: 如果设置了 <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataBoundControl.DataMember" /> 属性，则返回特定的已命名的 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.DataSourceView" />；否则，返回默认的 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.DataSourceView" />。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataBoundControl.GetData%2A> method retrieves a <xref:System.Web.UI.DataSourceView> object from the associated data source control by calling the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataBoundControl.GetDataSource%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataBoundControl.GetData%2A>方法检索<xref:System.Web.UI.DataSourceView>对象关联的数据源控件，通过调用从<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataBoundControl.GetDataSource%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataBoundControl.DataSource%2A> property is used to identify a data source, a default <xref:System.Web.UI.DataSourceView> object is created.
trans-unit.target: 如果<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataBoundControl.DataSource%2A>属性用于标识数据源，默认<xref:System.Web.UI.DataSourceView>创建对象。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates how the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataBoundControl.GetData%2A> method is called to retrieve the <xref:System.Web.UI.DataSourceView> object from the associated data source control and the <xref:System.Web.UI.DataSourceView.Select%2A> method is called to retrieve the data.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例演示如何<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataBoundControl.GetData%2A>调用方法来检索<xref:System.Web.UI.DataSourceView>从关联的数据源控件的对象和<xref:System.Web.UI.DataSourceView.Select%2A>调用方法来检索数据。

trans-unit.source: This code example is part of a larger example provided for the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataBoundControl> class.
trans-unit.target: 此代码示例摘自更大的示例为提供<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataBoundControl>类。

trans-unit.source: Both the <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataBoundControl.DataSource" /> and <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataBoundControl.DataSourceID" /> properties are set.
trans-unit.target: 同时设置了 <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataBoundControl.DataSource" /> 和 <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataBoundControl.DataSourceID" /> 属性。

trans-unit.source: \- or -
The <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataBoundControl.DataMember" /> property is set but a <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.DataSourceView" /> object by that name does not exist.
trans-unit.target: 设置了 <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataBoundControl.DataMember" /> 属性，但不存在具有该名称的 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.DataSourceView" /> 对象。

trans-unit.source: Retrieves the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.IDataSource" /> interface that the data-bound control is associated with, if any.
trans-unit.target: 检索与数据绑定控件关联的 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.IDataSource" /> 接口（如果有）。

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.IDataSource" /> that represents the data source identified by <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataBoundControl.DataSourceID" />.
trans-unit.target: 一个 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.IDataSource" />，表示由 <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataBoundControl.DataSourceID" /> 标识的数据源。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataBoundControl.GetData%2A> method calls the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataBoundControl.GetDataSource%2A> method internally.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataBoundControl.GetData%2A>方法调用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataBoundControl.GetDataSource%2A>方法内部。

trans-unit.source: A valid <xref:System.Web.UI.IDataSource> instance is retrieved by these two methods and is cached by the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataBoundControl> object until the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataBoundControl.OnDataPropertyChanged%2A> method signals that the data source has changed.
trans-unit.target: 一个有效<xref:System.Web.UI.IDataSource>实例检索的这两种方法，由缓存<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataBoundControl>对象直到<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataBoundControl.OnDataPropertyChanged%2A>方法发出信号表示数据源已更改。

trans-unit.source: The control identified by the <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataBoundControl.DataSourceID" /> property does not exist in the current container.
trans-unit.target: 当前容器中不存在由 <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataBoundControl.DataSourceID" /> 属性标识的控件。

trans-unit.source: \- or -
The control identified by the <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataBoundControl.DataSourceID" /> property does not implement the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.IDataSource" /> interface.
trans-unit.target: 由 <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataBoundControl.DataSourceID" /> 属性标识的控件不实现 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.IDataSource" /> 接口。

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that indicates whether model binding is in use.
trans-unit.target: 获取一个值，该值指示是否使用模型绑定。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if model binding is in use; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果正在使用模型绑定，则为 <see langword="true" />；否则为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: For a tutorial series on using model binding with Web Forms, see [Model Binding and Web Forms](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=286117).
trans-unit.target: 在 Web 窗体中使用模型绑定教程系列，请参阅[模型绑定和 Web 窗体](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=286117)。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the name of the data item type for strongly typed data binding.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置强类型化数据绑定的数据项目类型的名称。

trans-unit.source: The name of the model type.
trans-unit.target: 模型类型的名称。

trans-unit.source: Setting this property enables the `Item` and `BindItem` data-binding expressions.
trans-unit.target: 设置此属性使`Item`和`BindItem`数据绑定表达式。

trans-unit.source: Setting this method automatically enables Dynamic Data functionality.
trans-unit.target: 自动设置此方法可启用动态数据功能。

trans-unit.source: For a tutorial series on using model binding with Web Forms, see [Model Binding and Web Forms](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=286117).
trans-unit.target: 在 Web 窗体中使用模型绑定教程系列，请参阅[模型绑定和 Web 窗体](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=286117)。

trans-unit.source: An object that represents the view state to restore.
trans-unit.target: 一个对象，表示要还原的视图状态。

trans-unit.source: Restores view-state information from a previous page request that was saved by the <see cref="M:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataBoundControl.SaveViewState" /> method.
trans-unit.target: 从用 <see cref="M:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataBoundControl.SaveViewState" /> 方法保存的上一个页面请求还原视图状态信息。

trans-unit.source: Sets the state of the control in view state as successfully bound to data.
trans-unit.target: 将视图状态中的控件状态设置为成功绑定到数据。

trans-unit.source: The data-bound control maintains a value in view state that indicates whether it is currently bound to data.
trans-unit.target: 数据绑定控件保持视图状态，该值指示是否当前绑定到数据中的值。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataBoundControl.MarkAsDataBound%2A> method sets the value to `true`.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataBoundControl.MarkAsDataBound%2A>方法将值设置为`true`。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates how the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataBoundControl.MarkAsDataBound%2A> method is used by a derived data-bound control class.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例演示如何<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataBoundControl.MarkAsDataBound%2A>方法由派生的数据绑定控件类。

trans-unit.source: After data is retrieved by the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataBoundControl.GetData%2A> method and bound to the control with the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataBoundControl.PerformDataBinding%2A> method, the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataBoundControl.RequiresDataBinding%2A> property is set to `false` and the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataBoundControl.MarkAsDataBound%2A> method is called to signal that the control has completed binding and no longer requires it during the current page's life cycle.
trans-unit.target: 通过检索数据后<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataBoundControl.GetData%2A>方法，并绑定到控件<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataBoundControl.PerformDataBinding%2A>方法，<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataBoundControl.RequiresDataBinding%2A>属性设置为`false`和<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataBoundControl.MarkAsDataBound%2A>方法是调用以指示在控件完成绑定并且不再在当前页面的生命周期过程中需要它。

trans-unit.source: This code example is part of a larger example provided for the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataBoundControl> class.
trans-unit.target: 此代码示例摘自更大的示例为提供<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataBoundControl>类。

trans-unit.source: An object that provides access to the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ModelDataSource" /> object that is being created.
trans-unit.target: 提供访问要创建的 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ModelDataSource" /> 对象的对象。

trans-unit.source: Raises the <see cref="E:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataBoundControl.CreatingModelDataSource" /> event.
trans-unit.target: 引发 <see cref="E:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataBoundControl.CreatingModelDataSource" /> 事件。

trans-unit.source: Rebinds the data-bound control to its data after one of the base data source identification properties changes.
trans-unit.target: 在某一基数据源标识属性更改后，将数据绑定控件重新绑定到其数据。

trans-unit.source: The source of the event, the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.DataSourceView" />.
trans-unit.target: 事件的源，即 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.DataSourceView" />。

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.EventArgs" /> that contains event data.
trans-unit.target: 包含事件数据的 <see cref="T:System.EventArgs" />。

trans-unit.source: Raises the <see cref="E:System.Web.UI.DataSourceView.DataSourceViewChanged" /> event.
trans-unit.target: 引发 <see cref="E:System.Web.UI.DataSourceView.DataSourceViewChanged" /> 事件。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataBoundControl.OnDataSourceViewChanged%2A> method notifies a data-bound control that the underlying data source has changed and that the control should rebind and any necessary work should be performed.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataBoundControl.OnDataSourceViewChanged%2A>方法通知的数据绑定控件基础数据源已更改，并且该控件应重新绑定应执行任何必要的工作。

trans-unit.source: Typically, the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataBoundControl.OnDataSourceViewChanged%2A> method is called when a property of the data source view has changed.
trans-unit.target: 通常情况下，<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataBoundControl.OnDataSourceViewChanged%2A>数据源视图的属性已更改时调用方法。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataBoundControl> class sets the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataBoundControl.RequiresDataBinding%2A> property to `true` when it raises the <xref:System.Web.UI.DataSourceView.DataSourceViewChanged> event.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataBoundControl>类集<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataBoundControl.RequiresDataBinding%2A>属性`true`时，它会发出<xref:System.Web.UI.DataSourceView.DataSourceViewChanged>事件。

trans-unit.source: Raising an event invokes the event handler through a delegate.
trans-unit.target: 引发事件时，将通过委托调用事件处理程序。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md).
trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息，请参阅[处理和引发事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataBoundControl.OnDataSourceViewChanged%2A> method also allows derived classes to handle the event without attaching a delegate.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataBoundControl.OnDataSourceViewChanged%2A> 方法还允许派生类对事件进行处理而不必附加委托。

trans-unit.source: This is the preferred technique for handling the event in a derived class.
trans-unit.target: 这是在派生类中处理事件的首选技术。

trans-unit.source: When overriding <see cref="M:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataBoundControl.OnDataSourceViewChanged(System.Object,System.EventArgs)" /> in a derived class, be sure to call the base class's <see cref="M:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataBoundControl.OnDataSourceViewChanged(System.Object,System.EventArgs)" /> method so that registered delegates receive the event.
trans-unit.target: 在派生类中重写 <see cref="M:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataBoundControl.OnDataSourceViewChanged(System.Object,System.EventArgs)" /> 时，一定要调用基类的 <see cref="M:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataBoundControl.OnDataSourceViewChanged(System.Object,System.EventArgs)" /> 方法，以便已注册的委托对事件进行接收。

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.EventArgs" /> object that contains event data.
trans-unit.target: 包含事件数据的 <see cref="T:System.EventArgs" /> 对象。

trans-unit.source: Handles the <see cref="E:System.Web.UI.Control.Load" /> event.
trans-unit.target: 处理 <see cref="E:System.Web.UI.Control.Load" /> 事件。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataBoundControl> class calls the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataBoundControl.ConfirmInitState%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> method to set the initialized state of the data-bound control and sets the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataBoundControl.RequiresDataBinding%2A> property to `true` if the HTTP request is not a postback.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataBoundControl>类调用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataBoundControl.ConfirmInitState%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>方法以设置的数据绑定控件和集的初始化的状态<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataBoundControl.RequiresDataBinding%2A>属性`true`如果 HTTP 请求不是回发。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.Page" /> that raised the event.
trans-unit.target: 引发事件的 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.Page" />。

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.EventArgs" /> that contains the event data.
trans-unit.target: 包含事件数据的 <see cref="T:System.EventArgs" />。

trans-unit.source: Sets the initialized state of the data-bound control before the control is loaded.
trans-unit.target: 在加载数据绑定控件之前设置该控件的初始化状态。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataBoundControl.OnPagePreLoad%2A> method is overridden by the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataBoundControl> class to set the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataBoundControl.RequiresDataBinding%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> property to `true` in cases where the HTTP request is a postback and view state is enabled but the data-bound control has not yet been bound.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataBoundControl.OnPagePreLoad%2A>方法被重写通过<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataBoundControl>类来设置<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataBoundControl.RequiresDataBinding%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>属性`true`情况下，HTTP 请求是回发和启用视图状态，但尚未绑定数据绑定控件中。

trans-unit.source: This scenario is common with controls such as <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard> and <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MultiView>, where the visibility of the control is changed at run time.
trans-unit.target: 这种情况下是常见的控件，如<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard>和<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MultiView>、 在运行时更改控件的可见性的位置。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Collections.IEnumerable" /> list of data returned from a <see cref="M:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataBoundControl.PerformSelect" /> method call.
trans-unit.target: 从 <see cref="T:System.Collections.IEnumerable" /> 方法调用返回的数据的 <see cref="M:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataBoundControl.PerformSelect" /> 列表。

trans-unit.source: When overridden in a derived class, binds data from the data source to the control.
trans-unit.target: 在派生类中重写时，将数据源中的数据绑定到控件。

trans-unit.source: Implement this method instead of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataBoundControl.DataBind%2A> method when you derive a data-bound control from the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataBoundControl> class.
trans-unit.target: 实现此方法，而不是<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataBoundControl.DataBind%2A>方法派生中的数据绑定控件时<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataBoundControl>类。

trans-unit.source: Placing your control's data-binding logic in <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataBoundControl.PerformDataBinding%2A> enables you to avoid the <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.DataBinding> and <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataBoundControl.DataBound> events being raised in the wrong order.
trans-unit.target: 放置控件的数据绑定中的逻辑<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataBoundControl.PerformDataBinding%2A>使你可以避免<xref:System.Web.UI.Control.DataBinding>和<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataBoundControl.DataBound>以错误的顺序引发的事件。

trans-unit.source: While the base <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataBoundControl> class provides no specific implementation for this method, the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataBoundControl.PerformDataBinding%2A> method is called by the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataBoundControl.PerformSelect%2A> method to bind the values of any user interface (UI) controls to the data that is retrieved by the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataBoundControl.PerformSelect%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 虽然基<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataBoundControl>类提供了此方法中，没有特定实现<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataBoundControl.PerformDataBinding%2A>方法由调用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataBoundControl.PerformSelect%2A>方法以将任何用户界面 (UI) 的值绑定控件添加到将检索的数据<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataBoundControl.PerformSelect%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates how to implement the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataBoundControl.PerformDataBinding%2A> method in a class derived from <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataBoundControl>.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例演示如何实现<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataBoundControl.PerformDataBinding%2A>从派生类中的方法<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataBoundControl>。

trans-unit.source: The `TextBoxSet` control creates a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TextBox> control for each data item it is bound to.
trans-unit.target: `TextBoxSet`控件创建<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TextBox>绑定到每个数据项的控件。

trans-unit.source: This code example is part of a larger example provided for the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataBoundControl> class.
trans-unit.target: 此代码示例摘自更大的示例为提供<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataBoundControl>类。

trans-unit.source: Retrieves data from the associated data source.
trans-unit.target: 从关联的数据源中检索数据。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataBoundControl.PerformDataBinding%2A> method is called after data is retrieved to bind data to elements of the data-bound control.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataBoundControl.PerformDataBinding%2A>后检索数据以将数据绑定到数据绑定控件的元素调用方法。

trans-unit.source: Derived types override this method to retrieve data only if the default implementation is not adequate.
trans-unit.target: 派生的类型重写此方法来检索数据，仅当默认实现是不够的。

trans-unit.source: Typically, it is sufficient to provide a <xref:System.Web.UI.DataSourceViewSelectCallback> delegate that performs any custom data work, rather than implementing the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataBoundControl.PerformDataBinding%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 通常情况下，只需提供<xref:System.Web.UI.DataSourceViewSelectCallback>委托执行任何自定义数据的工作，而不是实现<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataBoundControl.PerformDataBinding%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates how to override the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataBoundControl.PerformSelect%2A> method to retrieve data from an associated data source using the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataBoundControl.GetData%2A> method and bind it to the elements of the control.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例演示如何重写<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataBoundControl.PerformSelect%2A>方法来检索数据，从关联的数据源使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataBoundControl.GetData%2A>方法并将其绑定到控件的元素。

trans-unit.source: This code example is part of a larger example provided for the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataBoundControl> class.
trans-unit.target: 此代码示例摘自更大的示例为提供<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataBoundControl>类。

trans-unit.source: Saves any view-state changes that have occurred since the time the page was posted back to the server.
trans-unit.target: 保存自页回发到服务器后发生的所有视图状态更改。

trans-unit.source: The control's current view state.
trans-unit.target: 控件当前的视图状态。

trans-unit.source: If there is no view state associated with the control, this method returns <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果没有与该控件关联的视图状态，则此方法返回 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: Gets a <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.DataSourceSelectArguments" /> object that the data-bound control uses when retrieving data from a data source control.
trans-unit.target: 获取数据绑定控件从数据源控件检索数据时使用的 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.DataSourceSelectArguments" /> 对象。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.DataSourceSelectArguments" /> value used by the data-bound control to retrieve data.
trans-unit.target: 数据绑定控件用于检索数据的 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.DataSourceSelectArguments" /> 值。

trans-unit.source: The default is <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.DataSourceSelectArguments.Empty" />.
trans-unit.target: 默认值为 <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.DataSourceSelectArguments.Empty" />。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataBoundControl.SelectArguments%2A> property calls the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataBoundControl.CreateDataSourceSelectArguments%2A> method to create a default <xref:System.Web.UI.DataSourceSelectArguments> object.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataBoundControl.SelectArguments%2A>属性调用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataBoundControl.CreateDataSourceSelectArguments%2A>方法来创建默认<xref:System.Web.UI.DataSourceSelectArguments>对象。

trans-unit.source: The name of the method to call in order to read data.
trans-unit.target: 为了读取数据要调用的方法的名称。

trans-unit.source: The name of the method.
trans-unit.target: 方法的名称。

trans-unit.source: Setting this property causes model binding to be used as the data-binding method.
trans-unit.target: 设置此属性会导致模型绑定要用作数据绑定方法。

trans-unit.source: For a tutorial series on using model binding with Web Forms, see [Model Binding and Web Forms](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=286117).
trans-unit.target: 在 Web 窗体中使用模型绑定教程系列，请参阅[模型绑定和 Web 窗体](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=286117)。

trans-unit.source: Causes view-state changes to the control to be tracked so they can be stored in the control's <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.StateBag" /> object.
trans-unit.target: 导致要跟踪的控件的视图状态的更改，以便这些更改可以存储到控件的 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.StateBag" /> 对象中。

trans-unit.source: An object set to the <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataBoundControl.DataSource" /> property.
trans-unit.target: 设置为 <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataBoundControl.DataSource" /> 属性的对象。

trans-unit.source: Verifies that the object a data-bound control binds to is one it can work with.
trans-unit.target: 验证数据绑定控件绑定到的对象是否可以和该控件一同使用。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataBoundControl.ValidateDataSource%2A> method is only called in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataBoundControl> class's mutator (`set` accessor) for the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataBoundControl.DataSource%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataBoundControl.ValidateDataSource%2A>仅调用方法<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataBoundControl>类的赋值函数 (`set`访问器) 为<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataBoundControl.DataSource%2A>属性。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataBoundControl> class checks the type of the object that is set for the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataBoundControl.DataSource%2A> property to ensure that it is an instance of the <xref:System.Web.UI.IDataSource>, <xref:System.ComponentModel.IListSource>, or <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerable> interface.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataBoundControl>类将检查为设置对象的类型<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataBoundControl.DataSource%2A>属性以确保它是实例<xref:System.Web.UI.IDataSource>， <xref:System.ComponentModel.IListSource>，或<xref:System.Collections.IEnumerable>接口。

trans-unit.source: The object passed by the <paramref name="dataSource" /> parameter is not <see langword="null" /> or a recognized type.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="dataSource" /> 参数传递的对象不为 <see langword="null" />，也不是可以识别的类型。
